channel.title: What is your biggest issue with billing?
channel.description: I'm doing a small research about how startups and bootstrappers are handling their billing, above all when they have to work with different payment methods and/or calculate taxes (specially the VAT nightmare). How's your experience? What are your biggest problems? Thanks!!

item.title: What is your biggest issue with billing?
item.dc:creator: nfelger
item.description:
I asked for some advice regarding billing & payment solutions a while ago, and got some great comments here: Payment / subscription billing options for SaaS

Read full topic
item.source: What is your biggest issue with billing?
